données publiques et de la science des données pour générer un

fondées sur des preuves. Mon expérience s’éten d du

professional_summary.text: Je suis un(e) consultant(e) passionné(e) par l’exploitation des données publiques et de la science des données pour générer un impact positif et faire progresser la société grâce à des pratiques fondées sur des preuves. Mon expérience s’éten d du développement de plans de gouvernance des données à des interventions techniques pointues sur le traitement des données. Ces expériences me permetten t d’être agile et exible dans la recherche de solutions à vos problématiques.

Mon expérience s’éten d du développement de plans de gouvernance des données à des interventions techniques pointues sur le traitement des données. Ces expériences me permetten t d’être agile et exible dans la recherche de solutions à vos problématiques.

extraction_warnings: Date range for education appears reversed ("2021 to 2020"). Extracted as written.
No explicit name, email, phone, LinkedIn or portfolio URL found.
Current employment end date not provided for ArData role; assumed ongoing.

scores.overall_summary: The CV shows relevant data‑science experience and solid technical skills, but it lacks essential personal details, quantified achievements, and suffers from formatting and date‑parsing issues that reduce its overall impact.

completeness.justification: Key personal sections are missing: name, email, phone, LinkedIn and portfolio URLs are absent. While location and a professional summary are present, the lack of contact information prevents recruiters from reaching the candidate.

experience_quality.justification: Three relevant roles are listed, showing progression from data analyst to consultant. However, total experience is only ~1.2 years with an average tenure of 14 months, and responsibilities are described without concrete outcomes or depth of responsibility.
evidence: "responsibilities": ["Développements R", "Formations R", "Assistance à l’utilisation de R", "Chef de projet Migrations SAS vers R à la DARES"]
"responsibilities": ["Études sur les politiques publiques avec R (évaluations, simulations, etc.)", "Formations R", "Développement du “Data Asset Warehouse for Nous”"]
"responsibilities": ["Gouvernance des données dans une organisation publique", "Automatisation des tâches en VBA", "Dashboarding et reporting"]

skills_relevance.justification: Six distinct skills are listed, all centered on R programming, statistics, and data visualisation, which align well with a data‑science consulting role. The skills are organized into two categories and provide specific tool mentions (tidyverse, quarto, RStudio, git).
evidence: "category": "COMPÉTENCES CLEFS", "skills": ["Manipulation des données et programmation avec R", "Data visualisations", "Statistique et modélisation"]

"category": "Compétences techniques", "skills": ["Maîtrise du langage R : maîtrise du tidyverse, de quarto, de R Markdown, développement de packages R", "Statistique : analyse des données, inférence, modélisation et machine learning", "Outils quotidiens : RStudio, git, Oce, Bases de données"]

impact_evidence.justification: No quantified results, metrics, or concrete impact statements are present in any role; the CV lacks evidence of measurable achievements.

clarity.justification: The CV includes the main sections (summary, experience, education, skills) and each section is clearly labeled. However, the professional summary contains typographical errors and broken words, and the absence of contact details hampers readability.
evidence: "professional_summary": {"text": "Je suis un(e) consultant(e) passionné(e) ... s’éten d du développement ... permetten t d’être agile et exible ..."}

consistency.justification: No timeline gaps or overlaps are detected, and job progression is logical. Date‑parsing warnings for French month names indicate formatting issues, but the chronological order remains coherent.
evidence: "date_issues": [{"section": "work_experience[0]", "issue_type": "invalid_format", "description": "Could not parse start date 'février 2024'"}, {"section": "work_experience[2]", "issue_type": "invalid_format", "description": "Could not parse start date 'avr 2022'"}]

strengths: Relevant data‑science and R programming expertise
Clear section structure (summary, experience, education, skills)
Consistent career progression within public‑policy and consulting contexts
weaknesses: Missing essential contact information (name, email, phone, LinkedIn)
No quantified achievements or impact metrics
Short overall tenure and limited depth in role descriptions
Formatting/typo issues in the professional summary
red_flags: Date parsing failures for French month names (février, avr)
Very short total professional experience (~1.2 years)
recommendations: Add complete contact details (name, email, phone, LinkedIn, portfolio) at the top of the CV.
Rewrite the professional summary to eliminate typographical errors and improve fluency.
Include quantified achievements for each role (e.g., % improvement, number of users trained, time saved).
Standardize date formats (e.g., use 'Feb 2024') to avoid parsing issues.
Consider adding a projects or certifications section to showcase practical applications of the listed skills.
